metamodel.description:
Check this to generate workflow models on leading frameworks.
This Workflow Metamodel allows to model Business processes.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce workflow models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR600 Workflow

technology.description:
Check this to generate your workflow models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution. It integrates the jBoss BPM to manage workflow.
SIDE allows to optimize the generation of advanced jPDL-based workflows.
technology.name: Alfresco-jBPM

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate workflow models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution. It comes with the jBoss BPM 5.1 engine to run generated advanced workflows.
SIDE provides the modeler with validation rules and the generators to ease production of advanced workflows on Alfresco 3.x.

generatorVersion.version: SIDE Workflow Generator for Alfresco Enterprise

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco instance on which have been generated and deployed new content types from the SIDE data model.
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco URL
